website_summaries.verdict: With a tough shell and 3 heating zones, this jacket gives you the extra warmth you need. Be aware that that the battery isn't included.
pros: 3 heat zones with 3 heat levels each
Adjustable cuffs and waist with drop-tail extended back
Works with all M12 and M18 REDLITHIUM batteries

customer_reviews.title: I think it's a sorry jacket.
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat bias, because I've had 2 electronic coats in the past. However this one just doesn't measure up for the price. The battery is super large and the battery-holding pocket is in the back. So its uncomfortable to sit at all times. The bigger battery does not produce a larger amount of heat. Also just the jacket itself feels like wearing cardboard b/c it doesn't move like clothes (rigid). I'm still very cold when wearing it its like having no jacket on at all. NO insulation.
customer_reviews.author: Bran

customer_reviews.title: warm wife=happy life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a small men's jacket for my small,cold wife.The arms are a bit long for her but this is a "working" jacket so the added length allows for reaching.Started with the 2.0 battery on med. heat w/good results,high setting will deplete battery much sooner.Tried a 1.5 battery for kicks but it exhausted rapidly.Recently tried a 3.0 which(obviously)supported longer high run time.Next test will be the 6.0 battery which I'm sure will be best in terms of time+heat but it is significantly larger+heaver than the 3 previous.Bottom line=she likes it(during 40-50F weather).
customer_reviews.author: llarry

customer_reviews.title: So practical
customer_reviews.text: Given as gift to my husband. Light to wear, warm, several heat settings. Ordered large and runs true to size. Definitely would recommend. Now all my sons, and husband have them. Each a different style, hoodie sweatshirt, coat with hood, and hoodless but with hand warmer in the pocket. Choose your needed style, and you will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NG154

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Possible improvements. 1 Vest pocket should be larger to accept todays phones. 2 battery pack should be relocated so it can be replaced without removing jacket.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this jacket !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear to walk. He is a superintendent for a bridge company and he's constantly outside in the cold and other elements. It works great for him. The only thing I would recommend is actually having the battery charger come with the purchase of the coat, because you have to buy this separate as of right now. I purchased an extra battery so he would be able to switch the batteries out while one is charging and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Cool jacket light weight but with heat acts like heavyweight
customer_reviews.text: I like this Jacket... it has nice big pockets and the heat works pretty good. Not bad in light rain too. People think it’s cool when they see light indicating it is on. It is a little stiff but also durable it is hard to rip. I usually wear with hoodie since collar is not too comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R. Uhrlass

customer_reviews.title: Please read**
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket! Looks and feels awesome and tough. The only reason I give 4 stars out of 5 is I feel that there needs to be a waist adjustment.. I’m 6’2” and weigh about 145 and I got a large and it fits perfectly in length but it’s a little baggy, but I’m a huge Milwaukee fan and have almost every other tool them make so I had to have this for the winter
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wesley Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's a Milwaukee!
customer_reviews.text: Finally broke down and got one for the husband (a die hard Milwaukee user) who already had the best. He LOVES it! I am on my second one, having already worn my 1st gen coat out. Seriously, these coats are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: J. Spotted Eagle Horse

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, I know the arms are not heated ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs small, I know the arms are not heated but my arms are colder then an unheated jacket, it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Jchan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made, heats up quick. I use it when I ride my motorcycle and keeps me warm during my entire 30 minutes ride.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He absolutely loves it! He previously had a hoodie that was the same brand, but he says this is so much nicer. He occasionally works in Chicago and mentioned how nice it was that the jacket was waterproof & even heated his hands since he had forgotten his gloves that day.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kaput

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold winters!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an electrician and works outside quite a bit. This coat was a Christmas gift for him. He absolutely loves it and I love the fact that he’s not getting sick in the Chicago winter, cause let’s face it, no one likes a sick man! Haha!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz R.

customer_reviews.title: Warm but came with a hole in the pocket
customer_reviews.text: Warm but came with a hole in the pocket. I was a bit disappointed I expect a lot from my Milwaukee tools if they are going to put there name on the jacket you know what I'm saying.
customer_reviews.author: Real trucks don't have sparkplugs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it!! Great fit for a picky working labored man! Wifey win!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Shollenberger

customer_reviews.title: Okay - Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: A little small in size & tight with the large battery placed in the designated jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: ERD

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t care for battery location . Got it for work . Outside a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Terri Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Returned item as was too small .. larger size was not available ..
customer_reviews.author: Water shoe

customer_reviews.title: a great fit and the heater is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This jacket rocks! Quality built jacket, a great fit and the heater is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mccallum

customer_reviews.title: so I'm very happy that this was available
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, my first one got stolen, so I'm very happy that this was available.
customer_reviews.author: Lavon Hollenshed

customer_reviews.title: Jacket
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is warm. The only down side is the battery life and the battery is bulky and bothers me when sitting in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Tough shell is too bulky Didnt pass the Florida winter test
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Luna

customer_reviews.title: Best quality products
customer_reviews.text: Duplicate , have more than one of these for diff location- need and like this product
customer_reviews.author: K Slater

customer_reviews.title: ReStock Fee
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like when I was thinking about returning and had ReTock fee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need better fabric to with stand sparks
customer_reviews.text: It don’t with heat from using power tools like grinders material don’t hold up from sparks
customer_reviews.author: paul chavis

customer_reviews.title: K
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the battery shape it’s like having a brick in you back but works great I will still use
customer_reviews.author: charles pahl

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband and he loves it! Great for outdoor winter activities/work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! A bit heavy for an old man but ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! A bit heavy for an old man but very effective in keeping warm.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is impressive
customer_reviews.text: Warm but uncomfortable. Hard to have your cake and eat it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff garnett

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket, but I did have higher expectations as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, but I did have higher expectations as far as ability to keep me warm in freezing weather.
customer_reviews.author: Langox510x

customer_reviews.title: Milwaukee Heated Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Well worth the money. Purchased as a christmas present for my husband and he is beyond thrilled with it. No more cold work days in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you extra comfortable and battery lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband as a birthday gift and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: Surprised husband for his birthday.
customer_reviews.text: Says it keeps him really warm, but doesn't overheat. "Best gift EVER". Teases people that the power button is his 'communicator' button to the Starship Enterprise.
customer_reviews.author: ThatOtherSharon

customer_reviews.title: Warm and so cool!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son who wanted it for Christmas. It is the coolest thing I've ever seen. 3 temperature settings at the touch of a button above the Milwaukee Logo. A light weight, water and wind resistant, keep you warm jacket. May have to order one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: I bought two jackets, I liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: i love this jacket, it heats fast and battery lasts about six hrs, large battery lasts about nine hrs. good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Benge

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lightweight warmth for a cold weather event. Quick charge with the ability to regulate three levels of warmth. Milwaukee Tools does it right.
customer_reviews.author: mojo44t4

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect ,works as promised,Heat settings work as promised,will buy another one in the future would recommend to anyone,shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you already have the battery.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this jacket. When I opened the box I discovered that the battery and charger aren't included. Now I have to buy a charger & battery $69.00 before I can try it out. If I would have read farther I would have discovered the jacket is available with a charger and battery. It's my mistake. I'm just didappointed. If you look at the picture it shows what looks like a battery. But when you scroll down on the page you will see that under specs it says no battery or charger included. So unless you already have an M12 tool and extra batteries you need to opt for the package deal.
customer_reviews.author: Old & Cheap.

product_meta.title: Milwaukee Jacket M12 12V Lithium-Ion Heated Front and Back Heat Zones All Sizes and Colors - Battery Not Included (Extra Large, Black)
product_meta.description: Size:Extra Large| Color:BlackPowered by M12 REDLITHIUM Battery Technology, Milwaukee M12 Heated Jackets use carbon fiber heating elements to create and distribute heat to the chest, back, and front hand pockets. For use in abrasive environments, ToughShell Stretch Polyester delivers 5X Longer Life than previous softshell jackets, and provides wind and water resistance to survive the elements. No Battery Included.
feature_bullets: ToughShell Stretch Polyester delivers 5X Longer Life and wind/water resistance FreeFlex Mobility Gussets provide enhanced mobility.
Washer and dryer safe Up to (8) hours of run-time with M12 REDLITHIUM 2.0 Compact Battery Pack.
No Battery Included. Compatible with all M12 REDLITHIUM Batteries and all M18 REDLITHIUM Batteries (M18 Power Source Sold Separately). 1 Year Limited Warranty
High loft insulation to trap heat (3) outer zip pockets, (1) inner zip pocket, (1) low-profile battery pocket.
One-touch LED controller with (3) heat settings per heat zone (chest and back zone can be adjusted independently of front hand pocket zone). Adjustable cuffs and waist with drop tail extended back.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars118 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
